scripts.debug:chathelper: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.helper.json
scripts.run:chathelper: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --event events/event.helper.json
scripts.debug:chathelper:workitem:create: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.helper.createworkitem.json
scripts.run:chathelper:workitem:create: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --event events/event.helper.createworkitem.json
scripts.debug:ConversationServiceFunction: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.storeMessages.json
scripts.debug:ConversationServiceFunction:create: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.createConversation.003.json
npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.createChannel.002.json
scripts.debug:ConversationServiceFunction:addpar: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.addparticipants.json
scripts.debug:ConversationServiceFunction:sendMe: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.sendMessage.001.json
scripts.debug:getConversations: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.getConversationsByWorkitemIds.json
scripts.debug:ConversationServiceFunction:proces: npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.processAccContractNotifications.json
npm run build && sam local invoke ConversationServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.event.processWorkitemNumDaysBeforeDueNotifications.json
scripts.package:lambda: npm run build && cd .aws-sam/build && zip -r -D -j ConversationServiceFunction.zip ConversationServiceFunction/*
scripts.deploy:package:dev: export $(cat .env.dev | xargs) && npm run build && npm run package:lambda && npm run deploy:package:conversations-service
